Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: The Soupy Sales Show
programme.desc: Comedy for all ages.

programme.title: You Bet Your Life
programme.desc: The secret word is grass; guests include a college football coach and a British TV personality.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Keepsake A young woman named Amanda comes to Sweetwater, claiming to be Teaspoon's daughter. But she and her companion's true intentions are to steal a keepsake worth a small fortune that once belonged to Teaspoon's dead daughter.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there’s more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don’t all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba’s lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: Christmas in the Rockies
programme.desc: After her father is hurt in a timber accident, Katie Jolly must enter a lumberjack competition to save her family's business. But when the paramedic who saved her dad's life also joins the contest, a romance sparks just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley’s parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don’t go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what’s best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son’s first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E3 A Storm Is Coming The 12 remaining contestants compete in a cowboy standoff immunity challenge and take on a relay race elimination challenge in a windstorm.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca’s courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy’s friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the “Three Guardsmen,” Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won’t be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what’s best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son’s first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E3 A Storm Is Coming The 12 remaining contestants compete in a cowboy standoff immunity challenge and take on a relay race elimination challenge in a windstorm.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca’s courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy’s friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the “Three Guardsmen,” Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won’t be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. Booger completes a job for an acquaintance who asks him to find a horse for his teenage granddaughter. The search for the right horse proves to be challenging, but he finally finds one gentle enough for an amateur rider. The experience reminds Booger of how passionate he is about working with horses, and he decides to accept the offer to train them in Austin. Struggling to find buyers for his specialty cattle sale, Cody meets with the Cattle Association Board to pitch the specialty sale to them and secure buyers. Bubba heads north to show the investors a location for the organic ranch, but when they don’t show up, he starts to wonder if this deal was a big mistake. Booger, Cody, and Bubba meet up and decide to sell off their entire herd, officially putting their partnership on hold. Jaclyn comes up with a plan to mend Booger and C

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E4 Obituary Newspaperman Byron Claremont writes an article about old gunslinger, Ben Russell, who settled down years ago. The article brings in a young gun, who murders Russell. Next, Claremont writes about Lucas McCain and his rifle, which brings more tragedy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E4 City Slicker Showdown Horse trainer Ken McNabb tests the cowboys' horse market acumen. Former NFL players Vernon Davis and Glenn Gronkowski join the competition.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E7 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend’s outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend’s outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty’s advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba’s deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E1 Saddle Up, Partner After going their separate ways to focus on individual pursuits, the cowboys come back together to help a friend rope some wild hogs. Realizing they still make a good team, they decide to partner up again to take their operation to a new level. Grandma reminds Booger of his family’s deep roots in the Florida cattle business, and Booger is inspired to look south for work in areas that aren’t affected by the drought. Bubba and Kaley host the gang for a cowboy-inspired gender reveal party. Cody surprises Misty with the plans to move forward on building their dream home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E5 Grit on the Open Range The cowboys compete in a talent show to earn immunity. The teams take on wild colts in the elimination challenge and two cowboys go home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls’ school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of “Stagecoach Mary.”.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother’s mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler’s heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie’s husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E8 False Colors The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E8 False Colors The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Heartless tycoon Bart Jason (Edward Asner) hires a group of thugs to force the MacDonald family out of El Dorado so he can claim their land. J.P. Harrah, the town's sheriff, is too deep in the throes of alcoholism to help the family. When Harrah's friend, noble elder gunfighter Cole Thorton (John Wayne), learns of the predicament, he travels to El Dorado with his upstart friend, Mississippi (James Caan), to help Harrah clean up in time for a shootout against Jason's men.

programme.title: The Last Wagon
programme.desc: Comanche Todd (Richard Widmark), a white man living with an Indian tribe, is captured by Sheriff Bull Harper (George Mathews) following the murder of the sheriff's three brothers. Heading back to town, the wagon train in which the vicious sheriff and his abused prisoner are traveling is attacked by a vengeful Apache tribe whose women and children have been killed by a band of white men. After the slaughter, Todd must bring the survivors, including the beautiful Jenny (Felicia Farr), to safety.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Keepsake A young woman named Amanda comes to Sweetwater, claiming to be Teaspoon's daughter. But she and her companion's true intentions are to steal a keepsake worth a small fortune that once belonged to Teaspoon's dead daughter.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there’s more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don’t all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba’s lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: Christmas in the Rockies
programme.desc: After her father is hurt in a timber accident, Katie Jolly must enter a lumberjack competition to save her family's business. But when the paramedic who saved her dad's life also joins the contest, a romance sparks just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley’s parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don’t go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what’s best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son’s first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E3 A Storm Is Coming The 12 remaining contestants compete in a cowboy standoff immunity challenge and take on a relay race elimination challenge in a windstorm.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca’s courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy’s friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the “Three Guardsmen,” Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won’t be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley’s parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don’t go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what’s best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. Booger completes a job for an acquaintance who asks him to find a horse for his teenage granddaughter. The search for the right horse proves to be challenging, but he finally finds one gentle enough for an amateur rider. The experience reminds Booger of how passionate he is about working with horses, and he decides to accept the offer to train them in Austin. Struggling to find buyers for his specialty cattle sale, Cody meets with the Cattle Association Board to pitch the specialty sale to them and secure buyers. Bubba heads north to show the investors a location for the organic ranch, but when they don’t show up, he starts to wonder if this deal was a big mistake. Booger, Cody, and Bubba meet up and decide to sell off their entire herd, officially putting their partnership on hold. Jaclyn comes up with a plan to mend Booger and C

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E4 Obituary Newspaperman Byron Claremont writes an article about old gunslinger, Ben Russell, who settled down years ago. The article brings in a young gun, who murders Russell. Next, Claremont writes about Lucas McCain and his rifle, which brings more tragedy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E4 City Slicker Showdown Horse trainer Ken McNabb tests the cowboys' horse market acumen. Former NFL players Vernon Davis and Glenn Gronkowski join the competition.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E7 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend’s outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).
