McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty’s advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba’s deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E1 Saddle Up, Partner After going their separate ways to focus on individual pursuits, the cowboys come back together to help a friend rope some wild hogs. Realizing they still make a good team, they decide to partner up again to take their operation to a new level. Grandma reminds Booger of his family’s deep roots in the Florida cattle business, and Booger is inspired to look south for work in areas that aren’t affected by the drought. Bubba and Kaley host the gang for a cowboy-inspired gender reveal party. Cody surprises Misty with the plans to move forward on building their dream home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E5 Grit on the Open Range The cowboys compete in a talent show to earn immunity. The teams take on wild colts in the elimination challenge and two cowboys go home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls’ school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of “Stagecoach Mary.”.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother’s mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler’s heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie’s husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E8 False Colors The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty’s advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba’s deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E1 Saddle Up, Partner After going their separate ways to focus on individual pursuits, the cowboys come back together to help a friend rope some wild hogs. Realizing they still make a good team, they decide to partner up again to take their operation to a new level. Grandma reminds Booger of his family’s deep roots in the Florida cattle business, and Booger is inspired to look south for work in areas that aren’t affected by the drought. Bubba and Kaley host the gang for a cowboy-inspired gender reveal party. Cody surprises Misty with the plans to move forward on building their dream home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E5 Grit on the Open Range The cowboys compete in a talent show to earn immunity. The teams take on wild colts in the elimination challenge and two cowboys go home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls’ school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of “Stagecoach Mary.”.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother’s mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler’s heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie’s husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.
